entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023
